COMMAND.NAME: breakundo
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Put a break into the flow of undo information for a buffer
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Put a break into the flow of undo information for bufferName.
COMMAND.STATUS:
The breakundo command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
